item.title: ESEB 2019 in Turku
item.description: ESEB 2019 I attended the European Society for Evolutionary Biology (ESEB) biennial conference in Turku, Finland. Many reasons (e.g., my first time to talk in an international congress) made me nervous. But the organizer of our session made the atmosphere less tense.
